name: Hilton Garden Inn Spokane Airport

reviews.text: Put on a seminar in this hotel. Hotel is convenient to the airport - complete with shuttle.
reviews.title: Great place with very supportive staff

reviews.text: Hotel staff was ultra-supportive, cooperative and easy to work with.
reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.text: Conference room was very accessible, well-lit and well-equipped.
reviews.title: Pricey but Comfortable

reviews.text: Guest room was clean, comfortable and quiet.
reviews.title: Good stay

reviews.text: Wish the restaurant and bar hand longer and earlier hours (closes during mid-day to late afternoon and then closes again early in the evening - earlier than our conference let out.
reviews.title: Spacious hotel, although breakfast is $$$

likes.disliked: — A bit out of the way if visiting Spokane

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly staff. Nice resturant right in the hotel that even served lunch and dinner. The staff was great. You are a little bit out of the city of Spokane/close to the airport but there was never a noise issue. Great bed nice and firm.
reviews.title: Nice, New

reviews.text: We stayed here one night when watching our friend compete in a nearby body building competition. The staff was excellent even when there was an error in an overbook on our room, they solved the problem right away and we received free breakfast for the next morning. We stayed on the third floor. It was quiet, spacious, clean and quite enjoyable. The morning breakfast is normally $10/person but offeres cooked to order omelets, pancakes, etc. plus a full cold bar buffet style. Delicious!
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: Was only at the hotel for a short time but highly recommend the propoerty. Staff is attentive, rooms clean and big. Will definitely return next time I am in Spokane
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent the last night of our vacation here before an early morning flight out. It was the perfect ending to a great trip. The hotel was quiet, immaculate, convenient, friendly and had possibly the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in. The staff was wonderful and especially helpful about coming back to the airport to get us after we discovered we had left a cell phone behind in the room! Overall a very nice place, we highly recommend it.
reviews.title: The perfect last night of our vacation

reviews.text: I was here in the beginning of October. I ahve to say this was a very nice hotel. The room was nice, the restaurant was good and the hotel staff very friendly. Also airport access is great and a gas station is down the road just barely a mile away ( for the rental car)
reviews.title: Nice Hotel. I would stay again.

reviews.text: While you can look across a field and see the airport terminal, you have to drive about 2 miles around the field to get to the airport. Quiet hotel, kept spotlessly clean, with a relaxing lobby and standard Hilton Garden Inn restaurant. The staff is attentive and polite. The rooms are larger than a standard big-city hotel room. This hotel is a solid choice.
reviews.title: Solid Business-Class Quality
trip to idaho
reviews.text: only place that had an opening all the motels were booked due to a wrestling tournament. had 2 kids under 2 and we had a great time at the hotel.nice continental breakfast that is served.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pretty good stay, not the best location in Airway Heights but quick access to freeway and downtown Spokane. Beds were fine, value was average. Nice thing is that they added a movie theatre walking distance from the hotel.
reviews.title: Not bad! Not right next to the airport but close enough...

reviews.text: Two friends and I headed out on a girls getaway. We decided on Spokane as there was shopping and gambling! We stopped at the casino where we asked about hotels. The security guard said that he had heard good things about the Hilton Garden Inn. Our second stop was Starbucks (where we received awesome service) and again had the Hilton Garden Inn recommended. With two positive comments we decided to give it a try. From check-in to check-out we had nothing but good service. The girls at the front desk were helpful - giving directions, recommending shopping malls to try, the room was spacious and comfortable. Passing houskeepers in the hall we always got a smile and a hello. Our first day there we made a trip to the casino via the on call, 24 hour shuttle. Breakfast was included with our room and was tasty with lots of food. After a hard day of shopping the second day we hit the pool and the hot tub. The hot tub was a little on the warm side, but the entire pool area was nice and clean.
reviews.title: A pleasurable stay

reviews.text: All in all I would highly recommend this hotel for your stay in the Spokane area.
reviews.title: Beautiful. Fairly new property.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've stayed in a number of Hilton Garden Inns around the country, and this is one of the nicer properties. An HGI is not a five start hotel with all the associated frills, but we find them to be of higher, more consistent quality than other similar hotels, and the Spokane airport location is no exception. Friendly staff; clean rooms; good amenities; fine bedding; adequate food options. It also was exceptionally quiet, especially considering the car and air traffic nearby, and the room seemed larger than normal. If you're wanting luxury or uniqueness, then you should look elsewhere; but if you have business near the airport or are flying out early, as we were, then this property is an excellent choice.
reviews.title: Very nice HGI

reviews.text: I stayed at this property the night before I flew out. The hotel is a typical HGI - very friendly staff, nice rooms, etc. While this hotel is close to the airport it is not close to anything else. It will require a car to drive to nearby restaurants (except for the one in the parking lot). It is a ways from downtown, but close to newer casino and other restuarants.
reviews.title: Great property - not close to anything.

reviews.text: The hotel has great beds and a friendly staff. Very convienent to the airport.
reviews.title: Another Nice HGI

reviews.text: I had a meeting in Cour d' Alene so I booked here and totally glad. Last time I was in the area I stayed at Hampton Inn airport - that was ok, but not even close to this HGI.
reviews.title: Still the Best in Spokane

reviews.text: I stayed here 2 nights and was comped a Diamond perk of a free drink each night.
reviews.title: change policy is unbearable

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Spokane Airport Hotel
